column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Thursday November 26 and Friday November 27 for the Thanksgiving holiday.
Regular traffic reports will resume Monday November 30 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: Also see the KYTC Twitter page.
